Business.headline: Indian Public Detests Trump's Pressure on Russian Oil: Experts

Technology.headline: IT-Slaves in Myanmar: Who Said New Technologies Will Make You Free?
Technology.summary: This piece highlights the grim reality of "IT-slaves" in Myanmar, exposing how new technologies, contrary to their liberating promise, are being exploited for human trafficking and forced labor. It questions the utopian narrative around technological advancement and its misuse.
key_points: Exposes "IT-slaves" in Myanmar.
Highlights technology's misuse for exploitation and forced labor.
Questions the liberating promise of new technologies.
